column4: I have 2 HDD, first I installed Windows 7 on second hdd, then I installed Ubuntu 9.10 on first, but after installation of Ubuntu it runs Windows7, no menu to select ubuntu
sata or ide (if ide make sure ubuntu was infact on the master channel when installing) if sata, you need to double check your bios settings
sata, first boot should be first hdd?
typically in my limited knowledge of how that works is that ubuntu needs to be installed on the "master" drive when installing for grub to provide those extra entries in grub
